Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to excellence and functionality. Considering its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. For this extraordinary piece, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $125. I trust that you will find its worth exceeds this investment. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
